DRAFT README
============

Add support for  a fallback language.

Usecase: You have de_DE and de_CH, nearly everything is the same but a few are
not, so if you don't find a phrase in de_CH look it up in the fallback, de_DE.


More info (German)

* http://www.integer-net.de/magento-at-landerversion-mit-fallback-modus-fur-ubersetzungen/
